meanings.sent1: I am stretching my arms to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys stretching her legs before going for a run.
meanings.sent3: The cat is stretching its body to fit into the small box.
meanings.sent4: His patience is stretching thin as he waits for the delayed train.
meanings.sent5: The rubber band was stretching to its limit before snapping.

meanings.definition: To reach or pull something in order to make it longer or wider
meanings.sent1: He is stretching the rubber band to see how far it can go.
meanings.sent2: The baker is stretching the dough to make a large pizza.
meanings.sent3: The child is stretching the truth about finishing homework.
meanings.sent4: Her smile is stretching across her face as she receives good news.
meanings.sent5: The artist is stretching the canvas to prepare it for painting.

meanings.definition: To make something more flexible or elastic by pulling it
meanings.sent1: The athlete is stretching his muscles before the race.
meanings.sent2: She is stretching the rubber band to make it easier to use.
meanings.sent3: The teacher is stretching the truth to make the story more interesting.
meanings.sent4: His imagination is stretching to create new worlds in his stories.
meanings.sent5: The fabric is stretching to accommodate the growing plant.

meanings.sent1: The river is stretching its banks after heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: His ambition is stretching beyond what others thought possible.
meanings.sent3: The balloon is stretching the air inside to stay afloat.
meanings.sent4: Her voice is stretching across the auditorium during the performance.
meanings.sent5: The city is stretching its resources to support the growing population.
